document_data.mainbody:
Euripanee Thundershield was a female dwarf mercenary in Phlan during the Tyranny of Dragons.
Euripanee left Citadel Adbar for a life as a mercenary.
In 1489 DR, during the Cult of the Dragons coup in the city of Phlan, she and others were captured by the cultists led by Farnvik. Euripanee was freed by some adventurers.
